title: “Thanks, I hate it”: Feline Fans Find a Way to Turn Their Cats Into Hoomans Using ChatGPT, and the Results Are Purrfectly Ridiculous
description: We've all been there, feline fam. We've all wondered what our cats would be like if they were hoomans. Well, we know what they would be like if they were hoomans - our adorable velcro cat would be that guy who follows you around everywhere and just goes with the flow. Our tuxedo cat, on the other hand, would be that goth girl that growled at people in middle school if they tried to sit with her at lunch. Let's just say that she really likes her purrsonal space. However, we have no idea what they would look like if they were hoomans. Well, now you can! Thanks to our ever-evolving friend, ChatGPT, you can now have it imagine what your cats would look like as hooman beans. A few feline fans already tried it, and let's just say that the results were…. interesting. It's purrfectly sweet, pawsitively unnerving, and 100% silly. Scroll down to see their ridiculous results below and have yourself a hearty laugh. Enjoy!
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: “Thanks, I hate it”: Feline Fans Find a Way to Turn Their Cats Into Hoomans Using ChatGPT, and the Results Are Purrfectly Ridiculous - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
We've all been there, feline fam. We've all wondered what our cats would be like if they were hoomans. Well, we know what they would be like if they were hoomans - our adorable velcro cat would be that guy who follows you around everywhere and just goes with the flow. Our tuxedo cat, on the other hand, would be that goth girl that growled at people in middle school if they tried to sit with her at lunch. Let's just say that she really likes her purrsonal space. 

However, we have no idea what they would look like if they were hoomans. Well, now you can! Thanks to our ever-evolving friend, ChatGPT, you can now have it imagine what your cats would look like as hooman beans. A few feline fans already tried it, and let's just say that the results were…. interesting. It's purrfectly sweet, pawsitively unnerving, and 100% silly. Scroll down to see their ridiculous results below and have yourself a hearty laugh. Enjoy!
